resources.string: WLAN PSK
Connected via WLAN assistant
Manage WLAN, Bluetooth, Airplane mode, mobile networks & VPNs.
WLAN Assistant
%1$s manages your device and doesn’t allow modifying or deleting this WLAN network. For more information, contact your administrator.
Select WLAN
Select WLAN
Use open WLAN automatically
Let a WLAN assistant automatically connect to open networks determined to be high quality
To improve location accuracy, system apps and services can still scan for WLAN networks. You can change this in LINK_BEGINscanning settingsLINK_END.
WLAN on during sleep
WLAN optimisation
Minimise battery usage when WLAN is on
Limit battery used by WLAN
Switch to mobile data if WLAN loses Internet access.
To see available networks, turn on WLAN.
Press the WLAN Protected Setup button on your router. It may be called \"WPS\" or marked with this symbol:

"If you skip WLAN setup:
"
"Your phone won't have an Internet connection.""
"
"You won't get software updates until you connect to the Internet.""
"
"You won't be able to activate device protection features at this time."

WLAN Calling
WLAN Calling mode

"Use WLAN calling to increase call quality in places where mobile network coverage is poor.
Cost For information about WLAN calling charges, please contact your service provider.
Notes on WLAN calling To stay on WLAN calling, make sure to stay in the WLAN range."

"This will reset all network settings, including:

Bluetooth
Change WLAN assistant?
Use GPS, WLAN, Bluetooth or mobile networks to determine location
Use WLAN, Bluetooth or mobile networks to determine location
WLAN scanning
Improve location by allowing system apps and services to detect WLAN networks at any time.
Enable WLAN Verbose Logging
Always allow WLAN Roam Scans
Increase WLAN logging level, show per SSID RSSI in WLAN Picker
When enabled, WLAN will be more aggressive in handing over the data connection to Mobile, when WLAN signal is low
Allow/Disallow WLAN Roam Scans based on the amount of data traffic present at the interface
Always keep mobile data active, even when WLAN is active (for fast network switching).
WLAN packets sent
WLAN packets received
Back up app data, WLAN passwords and other settings to Google™ servers
Stop backing up your WLAN passwords, bookmarks, other settings and app data, and erase all copies on Google™ servers?

"Automatically back up device data (such as WLAN passwords and call history) and app data (such as settings and files stored by apps) remotely.
When you turn on automatic backup, device and app data is periodically saved remotely. App data can be any data that an app has saved (based on developer settings), including potentially sensitive data such as contacts, messages and photos."
Show WLAN
Hide WLAN

"If you restrict background mobile data, some apps and services won't work unless you're connected to WLAN.
This setting affects all users on this phone."
Metered WLAN networks
To select metered networks, turn WLAN on.

"You can share this device with other people by creating additional users. Each user has their own space, which they can customise with apps, wallpapers and so on. Users can also adjust device settings such as WLAN that affect everyone.
When you add a new user, that person needs to set up their space.
Any user can update apps for all other users."
WLAN and Mobile
Allow modification of WLAN and Mobile settings
wifi WLAN network connection
WLAN off
Disables mobile data and WLAN when the screen is off

"Ultra STAMINA mode will extend battery lifetime significantly. It can be used when you can't charge your device for a long time.
Only a few basic functions, such as Phone and Messaging will be available. Tap \"More info\" for more details.
Note that Internet connection through WLAN and Mobile data will be disabled."

"Ultra STAMINA mode will extend the battery lifetime significantly. Note that Internet connection via WLAN and Mobile data will be disabled. Your Home screen will be switched to Ultra STAMINA mode Home.
Apps available in Ultra STAMINA mode"
WLAN is turned on. Select your network in the list.
Any ongoing WLAN operations such as media transfer, phone software update, backup and restore will be interrupted.
Waiting for WLAN connection
Set up & manage portable WLAN hotspot
Portable WLAN hotspot settings
WLAN CERT
China Telecom WLAN connected
Prioritise China Telecom WLAN
China Telecom WLAN networks will be prioritised over other WLAN networks when connecting
Could not connect to China Telecom WLAN networks as data traffic is disabled. Enable data traffic now?
Install WLAN certificates
Location-based WLAN
Auto connect to AT&T WLAN hotspot
AT&T WLAN auto connect
Change WLAN Certificate
WLAN Direct™ settings
Secured with WLAN CERT
Secured with WLAN PSK

"You can use your device as a Mobile Hotspot. This allows other devices (maximum 10) to connect to it via a WLAN network. The connected devices will have access to the Internet via your mobile network connection. Mobile Hotspot uses mobile data and can result in additional charges.
Mobile Hotspot consumes more battery. Connect the device to an outlet to extend the battery life."
Set up WLAN network

"STAMINA mode saves battery power by adjusting device settings. You can choose applications to run with reduced functionality during sleep mode. (This helps you save battery power because most apps keep draining the battery even during sleep mode.)
Functions disabled for selected apps: - WLAN - Mobile data - Timer
The notification light for all apps flashes in the same colour at the same frequency during sleep mode.
STAMINA mode is deactivated while you are controlling the device."
Airplane mode turns off all network connections, including calling, texting, Internet access, WLAN and Bluetooth.
Enable CT WLAN notification

"STAMINA mode includes:
• Extended standby Saves power when the screen is off by temporarily disabling WLAN and mobile data. Most applications will be inactive. When the screen is ON, your phone will function normally. If you want to keep some apps active while Extended standby is ON, add the apps to the APPS ACTIVE IN STANDBY list.
• Extended usage Saves power when your device is in use by restricting hardware performance. "
To share your current WLAN network, select the option \"Share WLAN info\" in the setting.
Share WLAN info
Share WLAN info
Unless you use WLAN, you will no longer be able to use the Internet, Email or other apps that require a data connection. Turn off the mobile data connection?
Tethering cannot be used while WLAN is on. Tethering will be disabled.
Please insert SIM card to share your phone’s data connection with other devices using Mobile WLAN Hotspot or USB tethering for Internet access.
Automatically switch to a preferred network when both the WLAN network and mobile network are available
WLAN cannot be used while tethering is on. WLAN will be disabled.
USB tethering and WLAN cannot be on at the same time. Turn off USB tethering?
When opening apps, tell me when WLAN is available
Show WLAN pop-ups
WLAN Notification
Notify me when WLAN is available
Available WLAN networks
You are connecting to the unsecured (open) WLAN network %1$s. Information that is sent is not encrypted and may be visible to others. Do you still want to connect?
WLAN disconnected. Setup cancelled.

"The WLAN network you're connected to is not connected to the Internet.
To automatically switch to the mobile network when this happens, turn on Avoid bad WLAN connections in the Advanced WLAN Settings."
No WLAN Internet connection
Avoid bad WLAN connections
"Use the mobile network whenever the WLAN network you're connected to has no Internet connection. (Data usage may apply.)"
The WLAN password wasn’t accepted. Please check the password and try again.
